name: Hawaiian Roll Roast Beef and Cheese Sandwiches
author: Ellie Wolfenson
summary: Easy, make-ahead, bite-sized sandwiches with Hawaiian rolls.
ingredients: 1 (12 count) package Hawaiian bread rolls, split
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread horseradish on the bottoms of the Hawaiian bread rolls and cover each with 1 slice roast beef and 1 slice Swiss cheese
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Cook and stir onion, brown sugar, spicy mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and garlic powder until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes
Pour over Hawaiian rolls and sprinkle rolls with poppy seeds
Bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 25 minutes
Uncover and bake until tops are lightly browned, about 10 minutes
